sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Upgrade scripts for this plugin installation. This is used to add Common metric group to Per User, Per Device, Per Named User and Per Named Device license metrics for SAMS.</description>
        <name>Add Common to the license metrics</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[// Adding Common metric group to Per User, Per Device, Per Named User and Per Named Device
var PER_USER = 'f60759f5c31222006081face81d3ae7b';
var PER_DEVICE = 'ee1759f5c31222006081face81d3ae7c';
var PER_NAMED_USER = '36d659f5c31222006081face81d3ae30';
var PER_NAMED_DEVICE = '1bf659f5c31222006081face81d3ae5e';

var COMMON_METRIC_GROUP = '6e2a21987f222200fa0d328c4efa915c';

SAMPAddMetricGroup.addMetricGroup(PER_USER, COMMON_METRIC_GROUP);
SAMPAddMetricGroup.addMetricGroup(PER_DEVICE, COMMON_METRIC_GROUP);
SAMPAddMetricGroup.addMetricGroup(PER_NAMED_USER, COMMON_METRIC_GROUP);
SAMPAddMetricGroup.addMetricGroup(PER_NAMED_DEVICE, COMMON_METRIC_GROUP);
]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2018-08-05 07:53:54</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>c54c06680b7313003f12851437673ac2</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>8</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>Add Common to the license metrics</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="">bd1f72f347213110020ba9f8536d43db</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_c54c06680b7313003f12851437673ac2</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2020-04-28 01:48:28</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
sys_metadata_link.sys_name: Add Common to the license metrics
